events.name: MCC Wall Painting at Eduardo Caballero
events.info: Wall painting for a mural depicting the extracurricular activities offered at the Eduardo Caballero public school.

properties.Description:
The Multicultural Club will be painting a mural depicting the extracurricular activities offered at Eduardo Caballero during the following times:

May 20th 9:00AM 12:00PM
May 21st 9:00AM 12:00PM
May 27th 9:00AM 12:00PM
May 28th 9:00AM 12:00PM

We will first paint a base color on the wall before adding the design.
Please bring 100 pesos and clothes that you don’t mind getting dirty.
We will be meeting at ASFM at 8:45 AM and carpooling to Eduardo Caballero
Eduardo Caballero location: https://goo.gl/maps/DcEUKJepL7wtCreh7
properties.Roles and Responsibilities:
Being on time
Providing 100 pesos to help purchase the supplies
Actively participating in the wall painting activity
Meeting at ASFM before heading to Eduardo Caballero
Helping to take volunteers to Eduardo Caballero (if you have a driver’s license)

events.name: BAZAR CRUZ ROSA ABP
events.info: Volunteers will be helping out in Cruz Rosa’s annual market that will take place in Parque Arboleda. Students will help with the set up and the logistics of the event.

properties.Description: Patrol the event, make sure everything is running smoothly
properties.Requirements: Attend a mandatory induction and instruction meeting
properties.Roles and Responsibilities: Staff, the students will help in the logistics of the event, by making sure that the participants are in their places, and basically anything required by Cruz Rosa or Arboleda, so the event is running smoothly.
properties.Dates and Schedules: Thursday June 1th in A201 during LUNCH
